about.pageDescription: Passionate music composer and producer, creating unique sonic universes for your audiovisual projects for over 15 years.
about.title: Music Composer, Music Producer

bio.paragraph1: I'm Loïc Ghanem, a Paris-based composer and music producer with a passion for soundscaping narratives. My journey into the world of music began at a young age, and for the past decade, it has been my purpose and profession.
bio.paragraph2: From crafting original music pieces to creating compelling music for visual media and music publishing, I've lent my sonic signature to various projects, enriching them with depth and emotion. One of my strengths lies in my ability to take a raw idea and transform it into a full-blown auditory experience. My work doesn't just exist in the background; it amplifies the story, setting the tone and enriching the viewer's experience.
bio.paragraph3: I pride myself on delivering unique, contemporary, and engaging soundscapes that resonate and create lasting impressions. Leveraging my extensive understanding of the intricate mechanics of music production and sound design, I excel at delivering compositions that require minimal maintenance, yet perform impeccably over time.
bio.paragraph4: I invite you to explore my portfolio and immerse yourself in the diverse musical worlds I've had the pleasure of creating. I look forward to collaborating with you on your next project, elevating it with my music.

pma2024.title: Production Music Awards
pma2024.work: "Sparkle in the Dark" & "Revenge" feat. Aaron Matts
pma2024.description: Honored with a double nomination in the brand-new Metal category at the Production Music Awards 2024.
pma2024.detail1: "Sparkle in the Dark" from the album Dystopia, released by Infinity Scores and published by Cezame Agency
pma2024.detail2: "Revenge" feat. Aaron Matts from the album Metalcore2, released by Justement Music and published by MYMA
pma2024.detail3: This recognition at the PMA 2024 highlights the power and energy of my Metal compositions, my commitment to production quality, and my passion for pushing the boundaries of modern production music.

pma2023.title: Production Music Awards
pma2023.description: Nominated in the Electronic category at the Production Music Awards 2023.
pma2023.detail1: "La Fontaine" feat. Flovry from the album Electronic Chill, released by Infinity Scores and published by Cezame Music Agency
pma2023.detail2: This nomination recognizes my innovative approach to electronic music, blending atmospheric textures with contemporary rhythms.
pma2023.detail3: This recognition validates my ability to create emotionally resonant electronic soundscapes that capture listeners while serving production music needs perfectly.

composition.title: Composition
composition.description: Custom original music creation for your film, TV, advertising and video game projects.
composition.largeTitle: Composition: Crafting Unique and Captivating Melodies
composition.fullDescription: As a professional composer, I have a deep passion for creating unique and captivating melodies. My expertise spans various genres, ensuring a wide range of possibilities for your project. I approach each project with a fresh perspective, dedicating time and effort to understand your needs and preferences. This attention to detail allows me to create compositions that are truly bespoke and aligned with your creative vision.

details.intro: I create **original music** to bring your audiovisual projects to life. Whether for a film, TV series, commercial, or video game, I compose original soundtracks that tell your story.
details.approach: My approach combines **artistic sensitivity** and **narrative vision**, creating unique sonic universes adapted to each project, from Metal to Hip-Hop, through Ambient and Electronic.

production.title: Production
production.description: Complete music production from A to Z, from arrangement to post-production.
production.largeTitle: Music Production: From Concept to Final Mix
production.fullDescription: My music production services encompass every stage of the process. With a deep understanding of music theory, a keen ear for detail, and proficiency in the latest production software, I am equipped to bring your musical ideas to fruition. Whether you need help with arranging, recording, mixing, or mastering, I provide a comprehensive solution tailored to your project's needs.

details.intro: I handle the **complete production** of your musical projects, from conception to final realization. My expertise covers all aspects of modern production.
details.approach: With a studio equipped with the latest technologies and in-depth knowledge of multiple musical genres, I transform your ideas into professional productions ready for distribution.

arranging.title: Arranging
arranging.description: Orchestral and instrumental arrangements to enhance your compositions.
arranging.fullDescription: My arranging skills will add depth and complexity to your music. With my extensive knowledge of orchestration and harmony, I will craft arrangements that bring out the best in your compositions. Whether you have a fully formed composition or a simple melody, I can transform it into a rich, fully realized piece of music.

details.intro: **Arranging** is the art of structuring and dressing a composition to reveal its full potential. I work on orchestration, harmony, and sonic texture to create rich and coherent arrangements.
details.approach: From symphonic orchestration to modern electronic arrangements, I master a wide range of techniques to bring your musical ideas to life.

vocalProducer.title: Vocal Producer
vocalProducer.description: Vocal direction and production for exceptional performances.
vocalProducer.largeTitle: Vocal Production: Elevating Your Vocal Performances
vocalProducer.fullDescription: As a vocal producer, I specialize in bringing out the best in a singer's performance. I assist singers with their vocal melodies, ensuring they deliver the best possible performance for their recordings. I offer specialized services such as correcting, mixing, and arranging vocals. I am skilled at pitch correction, vocal comping, and I can enhance performances using effects and processing tools. My job is to make the vocal shine, ensuring it fits perfectly within the mix and contributes effectively to the song's overall feel and message.

details.intro: As a **vocal producer**, I guide artists to capture the best vocal performances. My role is to extract the emotion and power from each voice.
details.approach: From pre-production to recording, I accompany singers through their creative process, providing precise and caring artistic direction.

mixing.title: Mixing
mixing.description: Professional mixing for balanced and punchy sound.
mixing.largeTitle: Mixing: Polishing Your Music to Perfection
mixing.fullDescription: Mixing is a critical step in the music production process, and one that I excel in. I will balance the elements of your track, ensuring that no instrument or voice is too loud or too soft. My mixing techniques will also add depth and dimension to your music, creating a soundscape that is rich and engaging.

details.intro: **Mixing** is the crucial step that transforms raw tracks into a cohesive and professional production. I balance, equalize, and shape each element to create an impactful mix.
details.approach: With an analytical and creative approach, I optimize the clarity, depth, and dynamics of your tracks so they sound perfect on all playback systems.

mastering.title: Mastering
mastering.description: High-quality mastering for optimal finalization of your productions.
mastering.largeTitle: Mastering: The Final Touch for Your Music
mastering.fullDescription: Mastering is the final step in the music production process, and it's one that I take very seriously. I will ensure your tracks are ready for distribution, optimizing them for all playback systems. My mastering services will give your music the final polish it needs, ensuring it sounds professional and stands up against other commercial releases.

details.intro: **Mastering** is the final touch that gives your music its professional shine. I prepare your tracks for distribution by optimizing the level, spectral balance, and consistency between tracks.
details.approach: My approach to mastering ensures your music sounds optimal on all listening systems, from headphones to hi-fi systems, while respecting industry standards.
services: Mastering for all formats (streaming, CD, vinyl)
